mapper.select: SELECT /* userSelectList */ USR_ID AS usrId , USR_NM AS usrNm , PHONE1_1 AS phone1_1 , PHONE1_2 AS phone1_2 , PHONE1_3 AS phone1_3 , EMAIL AS email , WRTR AS wrtr , UPDTR AS updtr , DATE_FORMAT(WRT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS wrtDt , DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS updDt FROM USERS ORDER BY USR_NM
SELECT /* userSelectListCount */ COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM USERS

SELECT /* userSelect */ USR_ID AS usrId , USR_NM AS usrNm , PHONE1_1 AS phone1_1 , PHONE1_2 AS phone1_2 , PHONE1_3 AS phone1_3 , EMAIL AS email , WRTR AS wrtr , UPDTR AS updtr , DATE_FORMAT(WRT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS wrtDt , DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS updDt FROM USERS WHERE USR_ID = #{usrId}
